resume.bio: I am pursuing a Software Design and Development degree at BYU–Idaho and I have a strong foundation in Python and C++. I have found the software design courses particularly useful because they teach me how to better visualize, communicate, and measure software concepts. I am looking for a job where I can learn to apply these software and coding skills in an industry setting.

jobs.title: Billing Coordinator
responsibilities: Analyzed and resolved utility discrepancies using Excel, VBA, and custom internal software.
Developed a VBA macro to refine discrepancy data and make discrepancy reports easier for my team to read.

jobs.title: IT Support Technician
responsibilities: Administrated Active Directory and O365 accounts and permissions for all employees.
Developed and maintained a VBA macro that the Project Managers needed to reformat a report each month.

jobs.title: Client Care Specialist
responsibilities: Identified and implemented existing software tools for Salesforce and Microsoft products that streamlined my teams efficiency.
Developed a task management system using VBA for Excel and Outlook to parse email task notifications and track task assignment and completion.

jobs.title: Unlicensed Assistive Personnel
responsibilities: Provided independent supervision and compassionate assistance to adults with developmental disabilities.
Independently maintained a regular log of client status through 15-minute checks, providing essential information for the rest of the care team.

jobs.title: Lawn Maintenance Technician
responsibilities: Performed weekly lawn maintenance, including mowing, trimming, fertilizing, and weeding, across various properties.

Consistently performed demanding physical labor over a 10-12 hour shift, including carrying heavy equipment, extensive walking, and moving other job materials such as fertilizer, gasoline, and grass clippings.

courses.title: Designing Data Structures
descriptions: Developed advanced C++ programming skills by defining my own custom versions of the data structures from the C++ std library.
Implemented a red-black balanced binary search tree and custom Map and Set classes that used that binary search tree as their underlying data structure.

courses.title: Parallelism and Concurrency
descriptions: Used threads and processes to improve program efficiency through parallelism and concurrency.
Applied these techniques to solve problems such as maze traversal and video frame compilation.

courses.title: Inheritance Design
descriptions: Developed polymorphic classes in C++ by applying inheritance principles to build interactive programs.
Collaborated with a partner to complete a chess game and an Earth orbit simulator, which each used polymorphic objects to increase code readability and abstraction.

about.summary: I am pursuing a Software Design and Development degree at BYU–Idaho and I have a strong foundation in Python and C++. I have found the software design courses particularly useful because they teach me how to better visualize, communicate, and measure software concepts. I am looking for a job where I can learn to apply these software and coding skills in an industry setting.

projects.name: Structure Chart Generator
descriptions: Parses through a python file and creates a structure chart based on the functions outlined in the python file.
Outputs an image version of the structure chart based on the provided python file

projects.name: Orbit Simulator
descriptions: Simulates the orbit of satellites around a 2D earth using advanced physics formulas.
Simulates a ship the user can use to fly around earth and destroy the satelites with a projectile weapon.
